pageContext.claim: “We have incredible things going on in Pennsylvania. We just opened up a $10 billion plant. We have many of them going up, many of them, lot of jobs. … Pennsylvania, would have never happened. They wouldn't have allowed him to frack, so they would have never been able to build it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is falsely taking credit and inflating the investment by $4 billion. In reality, the $6 billion Shell facility he's talking about received final approval before his election in 2016.
